title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: Bug 14197: Upon removing a working set, changes are immediately applied without any confirmation or warning.
OB: When a working set with one project is created and selected, the package view in the software is filtered accordingly.
EB: The software should display a confirmation dialog or warning to users before immediately applying changes when a working set is removed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a working set with one project.
2. Select the working set.
3. Remove the working set.
4. Observe if any confirmation dialog or warning is displayed before the changes are applied.
